home.title: Welcome to Severinsen Design & Redesign Bedrift

story.heading: Craftsmanship with heart and precision
paragraphs: For more than two decades, Severinsen Design & Redesign has helped people fall in love with their wardrobe again. With traditional techniques, mindful materials, and a sharp eye for detail, we create garments and interiors that feel entirely personal.

Every project begins with listening—to the stories you carry, the fabrics you cherish, and how you wish to feel in the finished piece. From there we design a bespoke plan and invite you into the process.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.description: We offer a wide range of design and redesign services tailored to your needs—from bespoke garments to inspiring courses and themed events.

sewing.title: Sewing & Tailoring
sewing.longDescription: Tailor-made solutions for your sewing needs—from alterations and repairs to new, one-of-a-kind garments. We ensure perfect fit and lasting quality.

redesign.title: Redesign & Upcycling
redesign.longDescription: Give your favorite pieces a new life. We transform garments and textiles into modern, personal expressions—crafted with care and sustainability in mind.

courses.title: Courses & Workshops
courses.longDescription: Learn new skills or deepen existing ones. We offer practical workshops in sewing, macramé, ceramics, and bunad craftsmanship—for all levels.

themeEvenings.title: Theme Evenings
themeEvenings.longDescription: Join inspiring evenings focused on techniques, materials, and creative processes—in a social and relaxed atmosphere.
